name: Abyssal (LaMax)
description:
- About - 

"Abyssal" is a shooting game more precisely a Shoot 'em up! In this game you will embody a ship to explore the bottom of a sea polluted by fuel and by the strangest creatures each other...

- Made by -  

Maxens Haramburu (me)

This game was made during a school project at Isart DIGITAL, for a period of 2 months.
